content: La donna ha la capacità di muoversi come se fosse una torre, cioè su file e colonne, e come se fosse un alfiere, cioè su diagonali.
translations: eng:The queen has the ability to move as much as if she were a rook, that is, over the rows and columns, as if she were a bi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
